me_no_target: That person has gone off to other lands...
me_self: You rub your head and create a static charge...
actor_room: $n looks around for someone to noogie.
me_room: You make a head locking motion and shake your fist at it -- the universal sign of the noogie.
actor_self: $n rubs $s OWN head and creates a static charge... *ZAP*
actor_other: $n grabs $N in a head lock and NOOGIES $M... ARGH!!!
actor_me: Oh NO, $n grabs you, throws you in a head lock and NOOGIES you!
me_actor: You grab $N, get $M in a head lock and NOOGIE $M!
